#include<stdio.h>
int c=0;
short int a[8][8],n;
void way(short int,short int);
int main()
{
    short int i,j;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
            scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
    }
    way(0,0);
    printf("%d",c);
    return 0;
}
void way(short int i,short int j)
{
    if(i==-1||j==-1||i==n||j==n)
        return;
    if((i==(n-1))&&(j==(n-1)))
    {
        c++;
        return;
    }
    if(a[i][j]==1)
        return;
    a[i][j]=1;
    way(i,j+1);
    way(i+1,j);
    way(i,j-1);
    way(i-1,j);
    a[i][j]=0;
}
